course_description: This final course focuses on competencies and pediatric nurse practitioner roles. Emphasis is on clinical nursing expertise for children with chronic illnesses and complex health problems; implementation of holistic, comprehensive plans of care; and follow up/referral in inpatient and ambulatory settings.
prerequisites: NRSG 545 or equivalent transfer credit as prerequisite.
sections: Class Nbr: 1722, Section #: 1, Type: LEC, Campus: ATL, Meets: W 10a-12:50p, Instructor: Rodriguez/Brown, Status: Open
